revised_title: Equilibrium of Ellipsoids with Unequal Axes in the Presence of Centrifugal Force
tldr: The author investigates the conditions under which an ellipsoid can be in equilibrium when revolving around its least axis, considering both gravitational and centrifugal forces. The study focuses on ellipsoids with three unequal axes and provides equations to determine the necessary conditions for equilibrium. The findings have implications for understanding the shapes of celestial bodies and their rotation.
